title: Closet Organizers, Fax and Copy Room, Large Picture Windows
neighborhood: 616 St. Paul Ave. , Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: The Piero is the most prestigious address, in urban-style elegance, that Los Angeles, California has to offer.
Experience gracious, apartment living in the heart of downtown.
Our superior location is moments from the financial district, fine dining, glamorous shopping, and vibrant nightlife.
Staples Center, Walt Disney Concert Hall, and Koreatown are just minutes from here.
All of the culture and arts that define Los Angeles are within reach when you live at The Piero.
With close proximity to the freeway, your commute in California is a breeze.
-Separate Men's and Women's Private Dry Saunas and Steam Rooms
-Yoga/Dance Studio w/ Large Flat-Screen TV and DVD Player
-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool (Heated for Year-Round Use)
-Two Private Computer Rooms with High Speed Internet Access
616 St. Paul Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90017
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
